page.title: 06ROMSLEY PEOPLE
page.content:
On our day out we used the afternoon to use the questionnaires we had made.
This is a summary of what we found out from ordinary people:_
The farmer we asked knew a lot about the area. He had lived here a long time. One lady was very kind, she gave us a drink. She had a swimming pool in her garden. A man we asked said he enjoyed gardening. He sounded posh. Lots of houses there had big gardens. All of the people we asked said there was no violence in Romsley. One woman said she had lived in Romsley for 26 years, which is a long time.
